name: Camp
description:
Initial concept was that you are alone out in the wilderness. Keep yourself fed, warm and alive.

Build up your camp and attract another settler, they may bring new skills and ideas...  grow your population, discover new recourses, skills etc, all the usual stuff.

There were a thousand different directions to go in, I'm not going to list them here but rather keep them back for the reboot so have stopped work on this one.

Features lost in a Unity update were:
- The chicken would incubate it's egg until it hatched so providing a maintainable source of chicken meat. You can still kill the chicken with the axe and collect it's meat.

- There was a second shack that initiated a visitor to arrive and allowed you to accept or reject them into your camp depending if you wanted their skill set.

Follow me to find out when the reboot starts
